91 I've thought the exact same thing actually. AI is already killing only fans. You love to see it. posted 20 hours ago by PatriotSam 47 comments award share report block Fuentes Updates @FuentesUpdates • 1d Nick Fuentes says AI sex robots are going to be the greatest thing mankind has ever created 😂 “Women are gonna be fucked… Everyone will prefer the robots over them, and they'll have to start acting nice again.”
47 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save Around the Web Hair Grows Back in A Few Days! At Any Stage of Baldness HaloGrow Prandogolio 10 points 20 hours ago Gross. Men need Jesus, not AI sex robots. permalink award report block reply BenDoverAssho 4 points 20 hours ago True, but a robot can't take you to court and get most of your money and other assets, and can't take your children away from you.
Divorce court totally fucks the man over. Marriage is a huge gamble for men. 50% lose their ass. permalink parent award report block reply I_Love_45-70_Gov 5 points 20 hours ago but a robot can't take you to court and get most of your money and other assets... ...not right at this moment. permalink parent award report block reply Prandogolio 2 points 20 hours ago Yes I know that all too well.  We need to fix the laws that make divorce so easy for women to initiate and make it so financially devastating for men. permalink parent award report block reply PatriotSam OP 3 points 20 hours ago Agree, but only fans will not die unless there's an alternative. And in this case we have an alternative that will completely put the whores out of business. And then they'll have to get real jobs again. This will in turn, increase their value somewhat. It's not really sexy for women to have jobs, but it's better for a woman to have a job than to be a prostitute. permalink parent award report block reply MAGA9428 -1 points 19 hours ago I disagree, I'd rather them be prostitutes. Actual prostitutes though. Not scam artists fleecing men out of their money while providing no real intimacy. I believe in what Martin Luther said... "Women were made to either be wives or prostitutes." permalink parent award report block reply PatriotSam OP 0 points 6 hours ago He really said that? Social media gases women way too much. Once Instagram and Facebook came into the picture it was over. These dudes like the shittiest selfies and these girls start thinking they're models because of it. permalink parent award report block reply BarrysOFace 1 points 19 hours ago The traditional solution is don't be a gooner faggot and control yourself. It will be terrible in the generation of men that it costs us. Do not be short sighted put your faith upon the LORD. You don't need a robot to jack you off. You have a wife. Together you'll make great things. I was a red piller, that site was amazing on reddit taught me how to be a man. So be a man and get a real relationship with 0 lies. You'll thank me later as your children catapult through everything that is fake and gay. Before you ask I'm a Christian. Read EVERY VERSE and apply it to you. It's easy for me because I was in a "repressive" household that made me learn it. It's my greatest treasure today. I wouldn't trade 100 million dollars for it. permalink award report block reply chickeninoven 3 points 20 hours ago So be a man and get a real relationship with 0 lies. So.. a relationship with a sex robot? permalink parent award report block reply AlexJonesIsRight 3 points 20 hours ago No the the acovenant of marriage as Christ tells us. You are called to a much higher purpose... to raise  new generation of Americans. You claim to be America first, but instead you glorify your maturation fantasy. Either become or man or Jack off like a pubescent child for your whole life. The globalist want you to be like that. Instead be a real man. permalink parent award report block reply AlexJonesIsRight 3 points 20 hours ago I'll reply again, what are the men that literature praise? You listen to Nick Fuentes and long for maturation bots.... I'll ask you do you know who owns all the port sites?? You're falling into the very trap you claim to not fall into. You. Are. Weak.
